Itens.valor:
Combining art with technology, the Cardano Warriors NFT platform celebrate to the old RPG games of the golden age of video games.

We use an exclusive algorithm for the generation of characters that have a unique character, but always respecting the races and classes of each character, seeming to have been made by hand.

In addition to a collection, our biggest ambition is take these characters to a mobile game, and make their evolution possible, in addition to the acquisition of weapons and equipment. And bring use and more value for your token.

Get your warrior, and contribute to making this project a reality.
We are a team of developers passionate about games, art and technology and we are combining cutting edge technology and art to bring our users a memorable experience on Cardano's blockchain.
Click on the link to access the collection.
